DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare subjective symptom ocular health group individual currently wear soft contact lenses daily wear basis , short period lens wear time course use differ care regimen .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study compare subjective symptom ocular health group individual currently wear soft contact lenses daily wear basis , short period lens wear time course use differ care regimen . Observations make monitor physiology .
DOC.criteria: An eligible participant one : Is 1745 year old full legal capacity volunteer . Has read sign information consent letter , opportunity ask question receive acceptable answer . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Does experience dryness relate symptom lens wear ( i.e . least 12 hour comfortable wearing time ) Is correctable visual acuity 6/7.5 ( 20/25 ) good ( eye ) habitual vision correction . Has normal binocular vision ( strabismus , amblyopia ) . Has clear cornea active ocular disease . Has ocular examination last two year . Has distance contact lens prescription +0.50D +6.00 DS 0.50D 12.00 DS . Has astigmatism le equal 1.00DC . Agrees wear study lens daily wear basis . Has pair glass updated prescription agree wear period lens wear ( 710 day ) require study . A person ineligible he/she : Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is aphakic . Has active ocular disease . Has systemic disease affect ocular health . Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study . Is pregnant lactating . Is participate clinical research study . Has know clinically significant sensitivity contact lens care solution use study . Has ocular systemic allergy could adversely affect contact lens wear . Currently wear lenses continuous extend wear basis . Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion ( dry eye ) would affect wear contact lens . Has pinguecula/pterygium , investigator 's judgment , make contact lens wear inadvisable . Is rigid lens wearer . Has corneal stain grade 2 ( macropunctate ) great corneal region either eye , sum corneal stain type ( severity ) great equal 4 across entire cornea either eye , corneal stain cover great equal 20 % corneal region either eye .
